data.text: Yahweh said to me, “Ezekiel, sing a sad funeral songa which will be a parable abouttwo of the kings of Israel.
She taught one of them to huntfor other animals to kill,
When people from other nations heard about him,
His mother waited for him to return,
He hunted along with other lionsfor animals to kill,
So people of other nations planned to kill him,
‘It is as though [SIM] your mother was a grapevine
That grapevine grew and became taller than all the nearby trees;
Now that vine has been planted in a hot, dry desert.
A fire started to burn its stem,
